text: The August 2016 Central Italy earthquake was a natural disaster that struck Central Italy on 24 August 2016 at 03:36 CEST. Its epicentre was close to Accumoli. It was followed by 40 strong aftershocks. More than 250 people were killed by the earthquake. ==References== Category:2016 disasters in Europe Category:2016 earthquakes Category:2010s in Italy Category:Abruzzo Category:August 2016 events Category:Earthquakes in Italy Category:Lazio Category:Marche Category:Umbria
title: August 2016 Central Italy earthquake
